text:
Saqi Farooqi (21 December 1936 – 19 January 2018) was an Urdu poet. He was born in Gorakhpur in Utter Pradesh, India. His famous works include "Behram ki wapsi" and "Razoon se bhara basta". He went from Pakistan to London and made an influence in English poetry.
Farooqi died on 19 January 2018 at the age of 81 in London.
